description: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block \u2014 Author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation
query: (winlog.event_data.Payload:/\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[/ OR winlog.event_data.Payload:/\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[/ OR winlog.event_data.Payload:/\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[/ OR winlog.event_data.Payload:/\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}/ OR winlog.event_data.Payload:/\\\\*mdr\\\\*\W\s*\)\.Name/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\\\\*mdr\\\\*\W\s*\)\.Name/ OR winlog.event_data.Payload:/\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(/ OR winlog.event_data.Payload:/\String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference/ OR powershell.command.invocation_details:/\String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference/)
